Function.name: singlerate
Function.Description:
singlerate (MathScript RT Module Class) Requires: Digital Filter Design Toolkit and MathScript RT Module
Use members of the singlerate class to design finite impulse response (FIR) or infinite impulse response (IIR) filters.
fir_linfconstr - FIR filter with constraints in frequency bands fir_linf - FIR filter using minimax fir_lpnorm - FIR filter using least p-th norm fir_minphase - Minimum phase spectral factor of FIR filter iir_comb - IIR comb filter iir_grpdelay - Allpass IIR filter approximating group delay iir_lpnorm - IIR filter using least p-th norm iir_lpnormconstr - IIR filter with constraints using least p-th norm iir_notch - Second-order IIR notch filter iir_peak - Second-order IIR peak filter
